TextBlock.Text: Phaius: Mammo is the capital planet of the Mancu Republic.
Phaius: The Republic is currently lead by President Dern.
Phaius: The city is also where the critically acclaimed Mammo cheese originates from.
Phaius: Over 200 tons of cheese is produced annually.
Phaius: The cheese is made from the milk of the red-bellied horned bukrood, a docile 6-legged mammal.
